data.name: Windmills Demo
data.short_description: Souls - like metroidvania with focus on combat and exploration. Overcome challenging bosses and discover new abilities. Live an epic journey through an unreliable narration that will change your experience depending on your actions.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 mb
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core 2 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 mb
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
